entry.title: Hello World
entry.summary: After 8 months of secrecy, SeaORM is now public!

entry.title: Welcome to SeaORM
entry.summary: One year ago, when we were writing data processing algorithms in Rust, we needed an async library to interface with a database. Back then, there weren't many choices. So we have to write our own.
